bugs.title: fluent-bit package doesn't have 'podman_metrics' input plugin

bugzilla.short_desc: fluent-bit package doesn't have 'podman_metrics' input plugin

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:

fluent-bit package installed from the EPEL repo doesn't have podman_metrics input:

# fluent-bit -i podman_metrics -o prometheus_exporter
Fluent Bit v2.1.1
* Copyright (C) 2015-2022 The Fluent Bit Authors
* Fluent Bit is a CNCF sub-project under the umbrella of Fluentd
* https://fluentbit.io

[2024/04/23 01:21:38] [error] [config] section 'podman_metrics' tried to instance a plugin name that don't exists
[2024/04/23 01:21:38] [error] configuration file contains errors, aborting.

# fluent-bit --help | grep podman

# fluent-bit --version
Fluent Bit v2.1.1
Git commit:

However, the same version downloaded from packages.fluentbit.io has this plugin:

# /opt/fluent-bit/bin/fluent-bit -i podman_metrics -o prometheus_exporter
Fluent Bit v2.1.1
* Copyright (C) 2015-2022 The Fluent Bit Authors
* Fluent Bit is a CNCF sub-project under the umbrella of Fluentd
* https://fluentbit.io

[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [fluent bit] version=2.1.1, commit=, pid=25207
[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [storage] ver=1.4.0, type=memory, sync=normal, checksum=off, max_chunks_up=128
[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [cmetrics] version=0.6.1
[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [ctraces ] version=0.3.0
[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [input:podman_metrics:podman_metrics.0] initializing
[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [input:podman_metrics:podman_metrics.0] storage_strategy='memory' (memory only)
[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [input:podman_metrics:podman_metrics.0] Using default config file /var/lib/containers/storage/overlay-containers/containers.json
[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [input:podman_metrics:podman_metrics.0] Detected cgroups v2
[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [input:podman_metrics:podman_metrics.0] Generating podman metrics
[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [output:prometheus_exporter:prometheus_exporter.0] listening iface=0.0.0.0 tcp_port=2021
[2024/04/23 01:24:14] [ info] [sp] stream processor started

# /opt/fluent-bit/bin/fluent-bit --help | grep podman
  podman_metrics          Podman metrics

# /opt/fluent-bit/bin/fluent-bit --version
Fluent Bit v2.1.1
Git commit: 

How reproducible: always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. dnf install fluent-bit
2. fluent-bit --help | grep podman

Actual results:

'podman_metrics' plugin doesn't exist

Expected results:

fluent-bit package contains 'podman_metrics' plugin

Additional info:

https://docs.fluentbit.io/manual/v/2.1/pipeline/inputs/podman-metrics

Hi ivanov17@

Yeah, this is due to [Podman Metrics Disabled](https://src.fedoraproject.org/rpms/fluent-bit/blob/rawhide/f/fluent-bit.spec#_52).

Enabling these metrics made various compilation errors. This can be reverted by making a new build without that line. I believe default is 'On'.

Right now I am going through an effort to bring v.2.2. to f40, f39, f38, EPEL9 and EPEL8, which also won't have the metrics you are looking. Once I complete the release of v2.2.2  I'll probably wait some time before moving to 3.x (might take me 5 months due to other priorities).

Having saying this, if you need Podman metrics, please take a look and I send a PR, if not I could probably look into within some time

FEDORA-EPEL-2024-62eb1bcb21 (fluent-bit-3.0.4-1.el9) has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 9.
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2024-62eb1bcb21

FEDORA-EPEL-2024-62eb1bcb21 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 9 testing repository.

You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2024-62eb1bcb21

See also https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for more information on how to test updates.

bugs.title: Upgrade to Fix Critical cve-2024-4323 to upgrade to 2.2.3 or 3.0.4+

bugzilla.short_desc: Upgrade to Fix Critical cve-2024-4323 to upgrade to 2.2.3 or 3.0.4+

long_desc.thetext:
security vulnerability (known as CVE-2024-4323) that impacts Fluent Bit versions 2.0.7 through 3.0.3. The latest version of Fluent Bit, version 3.0.4, fixes this issue. Weâ€™ve also backported  fix to Fluent Bit version 2.2.3, the last release of Fluent Bit v2.


https://fluentbit.io/blog/2024/05/21/statement-on-cve-2024-4323-and-its-fix/

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by leoswaldo.
This update's test gating status has been changed to 'ignored'.
This update has been pushed to testing.
This update has been submitted for stable by bodhi.
